verses.name: Psalms 134:1
verses.text: Behold, bless ye the Lord, all ye servants of the Lord, which by night stand in the house of the Lord.

verses.name: Psalms 134:2
verses.text: Lift up your hands in the sanctuary, and bless the Lord.

verses.name: Psalms 134:3
verses.text: The Lord that made heaven and earth bless thee out of Zion.
